subject: Giants Stadium (NJ)
Trades (Sports)
Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Now that the Giants have cut Plaxico Burress and have shown no inclination to re-sign Amani Toomer, they need at least one big wide receiver.
snippet: Now that the Giants have cut Plaxico Burress and have shown no inclination to re-sign Amani Toomer, they need at least one big wide receiver.
